      • executeToDestination

        public int executeToDestination(String pointerStr,
                                Source source,
                                net.sf.saxon.s9api.Destination destination)
                         throws XPointerException
        Execute a xpointer expression on a xml source. The result is send to a Saxon Destination
        Parameters:
        pointerStr - xpointer expression
        source - xml source
        destination - Saxon destination of result stream
        Returns:
        number of elements in result infoset excluding comments et processing instructions
        Throws:
        XPointerException - the x pointer exception

      • verifyXPathExpression

                                    String xpathExpression)
        Utility method for verifying xpath expression
        Parameters:
        xmlNsSchemes - namespaces list
        xpathExpression - xpath expression to test
        Returns:
        empty string if expression is right, error otherwise
